website_summaries.verdict: Filtration system, accessories, and the newest version of the the BioCube line.
pros: Powerful LED light comes with timer to create a unique look
Light system produces natural effect similar to actual day and night lighting
This tank comes with numerous features for a luxury setup
Newest model, but it is compatible with all older BioCube accessories
cons: Some customers found some of the accessories, like the hydrometer, to be unnecessary

customer_reviews.title: Stand is horribly built...
customer_reviews.text: So, the tank itself is great! I've had one before, and loved it. Now, the stand they sent is really crap... The holes were drilled poorly and at odd angles, and off center of where they SHOULD be. With that, I cannot properly mount one of the doors, as the side panel overlaps where they placed the hole for the door... I would've sent it back, however I needed to set it up right when I received it as I had live rock, water and sand waiting... So, I'm not at all happy with this purchase as the stand really messed the whole thing up. Total bummer as the tank itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tank
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tank! Would recommend for any one just starting out in the saltwater hobby. I already wish I would have gone bigger, but this is wonderful for my space. The tank stand is a little wobbly without the tank on it. However, once you get the tank on the stand filled with water, sand, and rock, it stays pretty stable.
customer_reviews.author: Feisty_Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice tank BUT
customer_reviews.text: Nice tank BUT, I didn’t listen to the reviews about the tank stand. It would wobble just from wiping the glass. I had to get wood cut that fit the back and screw it in myself and now it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful set-up. Looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set-up. Looks great in my living room. I have had it running about a month. Plenty of room in the stand to keep food, extra filtration, siphon, salt, test kits, etc. Very nice lighting and it is great to have room to conceal the heater and skimmer under the tank lid.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great tank!
customer_reviews.text: This bio cube is a great little tank. Easy to assemble, up and running in no time. We have it in the corner of a room and it looks great. Love the day/night lights, and so do the fish! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tank puffer loves it and so do we
customer_reviews.text: Love this tank and stand .stand is sturdy and tank is beautiful, our F8puffer loves it . Filter and pump is good .. only complaint is the skimmer stopped working after one day .i would recommend this tank
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: protein skimmer never worked
customer_reviews.text: like the tank itself very much but the skimmer never worked for me/I had to buy another one for the tank
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and she loved it! Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Skip buying the stand, in my opinion the stand is flimsy junk. Tank seems decent so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peters

customer_reviews.title: .  I have to had it for 3 years and love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maintain. A lot quieter than having a sump filter. Easy to clean, always get compliments on the tank
customer_reviews.author: steve p.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Mine cracked in the middle of the night in the front left bend. if you do a google search you will see these are known for cracking in the front left bend
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

product_meta.title: BioCube Coralife Size 32 LED Aquarium Reef Package (with New Improved Stand)
product_meta.description: This REEF PACKAGE combines the Size 32 LED BioCube with the NEW & IMPROVED BioCube Stand and BioCube Protein Skimmer along with a BioCube Algae Cleaning Magnet and Coralife Mini Hydrometer. The Coralife NEW STYLE Size 32 LED BioCube Aquarium features LED lighting and timer capabilities–taking it to the next level of all-inclusive aquariums. Just like older BioCubes, it has a compact and customizable filtration chamber, hinge-top canopy design, quiet submersible pump, dual intakes, adjustable return nozzle and clear glass back panel for easy refugium set-up. Compatible with all existing BioCube accessories. Included is the NEW AND IMPROVED BIOCUBE STAND. This NEW & IMPROVED VERSION features a solid back panel for added stability. No glue is required.
feature_bullets: This REEF PACKAGE combines the Size 32 LED BioCube with the BioCube Stand and BioCube Protein Skimmer along with a BioCube Algae Cleaning Magnet and Coralife Mini Hydrometer
The Coralife NEW STYLE Size 32 LED BioCube Aquarium features LED lighting and timer capabilities–taking it to the next level of all-inclusive aquariums

Just like older BioCubes, it has a compact and customizable filtration chamber, hinge-top canopy design, quiet submersible pump, dual intakes, adjustable return nozzle and clear glass back panel for easy refugium set-up
Compatible with all existing BioCube accessories
Included is the NEW AND IMPROVED BIOCUBE STAND. This NEW & IMPROVED VERSION features a solid back panel for added stability. No glue is required.
